title: hostmaria
author: hostmaria
created_time: September 10, 2022, 09:32:07 PMLast edit: October 16, 2022, 10:46:13 PM by hostmaria
content: Coin SpecsDescription in few words: Masternode Coin for Maria Ecosystem. Unlimited supply. 10% from block rewards got to Treasury (to be used on marketing and development).Details:PoS: from the block 200 - ∞Algorithm: QuarkPremine: 8,888,888Block Time: 60 SecondsMaturity: 100 ConfirmationsMN Collateral: 100,000Prefix: Maria addresses start with the capital letter "M"Ports: 47773---Maria Coin phase 1 (Launch) lead developer: Liquid369: https://github.com/Liquid369---Links:Explorer: https://explorer.mariacoin.comWebsite: https://www.mariacoin.comGitHub: https://github.com/hostmaria/mariacoin/Whitepaper: https://github.com/hostmaria/mariacoin/blob/main/whitepaper.mdSocialDiscord: https://discord.gg/cGsXc3gKeQTwitter: https://twitter.com/TheMariaCoinTelegram: https://t.me/themariacoinReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/mariacoin/Genesis BlockBlock Height: 1Reward Amount: 8,888,888 MARIA Initial pre-mine---Rewards BreakdownBlock: 1 - 199 - Proof of WorkReward in a Single Block: 888Treasury: 88.80 (10%)Block: 200 - ∞ - Proof of StakeReward in a Single Block: 888Treasury: 88.80 (10%)MN Reward: 532.8 (60%)Staker Reward: 266.4 (30%)--Rewards & Halving(Reward breakdown: 10% Treasury, 60% Masternode Reward, 30% Staker Reward)Block (from & to)   - Reward200 - 500'000 - 888 MARIA500'001 - 1'000'000 - 444 MARIA1'000'001 - 1'500'000 - 222 MARIA1'500'001 - 2'000'000 - 111 MARIA2'000'001 - 2'500'000 - 55.5 MARIA2'500'001 - Unlimited - 27.75 MARIA---TreasuryThe idea is based on the DASH Treasury.Every new block, apart from the awards to 1 MN holder and 1 Staker, will also contain 88.8 Maria Coins that are intended for the Treasury. The coins will be paid out to the Treasury every 4300 blocks (to be confirmed).Treasury funds will be spent as follows: 50% on development and 50% on marketing only.---Wallets went live today, September 10th 2022 and are available at: https://github.com/hostmaria/mariacoin/releasesFirst exchange where MariaCoin will be available will be at StakeCube with whose team we have friendly relationships.This is a short announcement for the history.Best wishes all!Helmuts

comments.author: hostmaria
comments.body: [Update]Yesterday, September 16th, 2022, the $Maria coin was launched at StakeCube.net - one of the leading crypto exchanges for PoS coins. And, we consider StakeCube our friends, especially as have met in person and keep regular contact between us.Available pairs:Maria/BTC: https://stakecube.net/app/exchange/maria_btcMaria/SCC: https://stakecube.net/app/exchange/maria_sccMaria/USDT: https://stakecube.net/app/exchange/maria_usdt$Maria coin will be exclusively available at the StakeCube exchange for 1 month.

comments.body: [update]Maria Web Wallet has been launched to the public: https://mariawallet.comIt is a fork of myPIVXwallet.orgBest wishes!Helmuts

comments.author: hostmaria
comments.body: [update]$Maria coin is officially listed at CoinGecko. This means that very soon at StakeCube you will see your portfolio and daily earnings in fiat.Link: https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/mariaAnd, thank you, to our friends at StakeCube who placed trust on us!.. interesting morning.. I would never expect that such a thing as a Coingecko listing would generate such an interesting spike of interest in $Maria.Still, it is all about the ecosystem we are building  .. $Maria, is just money - let us not get too obsessed with the golden bull.Great day all!!Helmuts

comments.author: hostmaria
comments.body: We are honored to announce that $Maria coin (a layer 1 cryptocurrency we have created for the Maria Ecosystem) is live, accepted, and already being traded at 2 significant size cryptocurrency exchanges:Dex-Trade.com - CoinGecko ranking: #32, Trust Score: 8 and normalised daily trading volume for the last 24 hours: $94,084,107 - https://www.coingecko.com/en/exchanges/dextradeFinexBox.com - CoinGecko ranking: #69, Trust Score: 7 and normalised daily trading volume for the last 24 hours: $9,159,470 - https://www.coingecko.com/en/exchanges/finexbox---Available PairsDex-Trade:MARIA-BTC: https://dex-trade.com/spot/trading/MARIABTCMARIA-USDT: https://dex-trade.com/spot/trading/MARIAUSDTFinexBox:MARIA-BTC: https://www.finexbox.com/market/pair/MARIA-BTC.htmlMARIA-ETH: https://www.finexbox.com/market/pair/MARIA-ETH.html---Best wishes,Helmuts

comments.body: [Update - NEW Exchange Listing]$Maria coin is live at Octium.io(referral link for joining: https://ej.uz/octium)Trading pairs:MARIA-BTC: https://ex.octium.io/market/mariabtcMARIA-ETH: https://ex.octium.io/market/mariaethMARIA-USDT: https://ex.octium.io/market/mariausdtMARIA-BNB: https://ex.octium.io/market/mariabnbOctium.io is a new India based cryptocurrency exchange, and we have big plans on working with Octium that go further than just being listed at this most-promissing exchange.Have a great day all!Helmuts

comments.author: hostmaria
comments.body: Maria Core new update is here!👉 https://github.com/hostmaria/mariacoin/releasesMaria Core 1.9.0 is Mandatory Update.This update is considered mandatory due to consensus-breaking changes that users would need to update ASAP. There are no enforcement heights, but activation will occur after New Years. Meaning everyone can update at their leisure over the Holidays, but to prevent forking, please update by January 3rd 2023.Changelog- New rewards schedule- Halving every 500k blocks for staker/mn- GUI Color fixes- fetch-params.sh corruption fixes- Additional seednodes- New Seed node setup Docs- Masternode setup docs👉 https://github.com/hostmaria/mariacoin/releases

comments.body: [Listing at a MN Directory]Good morning everyone,I am honored to announce that $Maria is listed at https://masternodes.biz/cryptocurrency/MARIA - MasterNode directory that shows various details of your favourite coins like: masternode Statistics, pro-active masternode monitoring, masternode explorer, free collateral changes and more..If you are a coin owner, you can contact William Lay#6316 directly at Discord to get your coin listed as well Have the most productive and positive day!Helmuts
